nodes.text: Classic Moment is a regular feature of Star Wars Insider magazine that selects one scene in Star Wars continuity, reviews what happened through a script excerpt or brief overview, provides quotes from individuals involved in the production process and explains why the scene is considered to be notable. "Classic Moment" debuted in Star Wars Insider 101.
Star Wars Insider 102: "The Emperor Taunts Luke"
Star Wars Insider 104: "Passing on the Lightsaber"
Star Wars Insider 106: "Boba Fett Encounter" (by Brian J. Robb)
According to the "Next Time" teaser for this department in Star Wars Insider 105, this iteration of "Classic Moment" originally was going to be "Dooku Taunts Obi-Wan Kenobi."
Star Wars Insider 107: "Goodnight, Aunt Mara" (by Jonathan Wilkins)
Star Wars Insider 108: "Unmasking Vader" (by Brian J. Robb)
Star Wars Insider 138: "Thank the Maker" (by Neil Edwards)
